hero.title: I am
hero.subTitle: Full Stack Web Developer
hero.description: I am a developer passionate about technology, design, and creativity. My main goal is to design and build efficient, secure, and scalable web solutions.

aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.subTitle: Hello, I am Nayleth
aboutMe.description: I am passionate about innovative design and technologies. My primary goal is to create and develop highly efficient web solutions. I stand out for my calm and patient approach, which allows me to tackle projects with attention to detail and work effectively in a team.

boost.title: Boost
boost.desc: As a developer, I offer customized technological solutions for companies looking to enhance their digital presence with modern technologies to ensure effective and tailored results.

creative.title: Creative
creative.desc: As a developer, I provide personalized technological solutions for companies seeking to strengthen their digital presence using modern technologies to ensure effective and customized results.

quality.title: Quality
quality.desc: My commitment is to deliver comprehensive solutions that integrate innovation, functionality, and quality design. I work collaboratively with companies to understand their goals and challenges.

texts.text: I felt super comfortable working with her; she is very responsible.

texts3.text: It was a pleasure working with this colleague; her way of working is very organized.

texts4.text: Fascinated with her work; she knows how to integrate perfectly.

contactMe.title: Get in Touch
contactMe.subTitle: I am always open to new opportunities and collaborations.
contactMe.name: Name

hotel.title: Hotel Application
hotel.desc: This app is designed for a great user experience. It features protected routes, a booking registry, reviews, city filters, and is built with React and libraries like Tailwind, React Hook Form, among others.

rickAndMorty.title: Rick and Morty
rickAndMorty.desc: Application developed with React to consume the Rick and Morty API, displaying detailed information about characters, episodes, and locations. It implements asynchronous HTTP requests to fetch real-time data, ensuring a smooth and dynamic experience.

crud.title: User Crud
crud.desc: User CRUD developed with React, simple and practical. It includes a modal to dynamically add new users, a button to edit, and another to delete.

weather.title: Weather
weather.desc: Developed with React, this app shows real-time updated weather conditions. It allows users to check the weather by location.
